            <p> A non-profit research project focused on uncovering health disparities and global challenges using geography.

<p>We believe that the <span style='text-decoration: underline;text-decoration-color: #00A9A3;'>truth is worth discovering.</span>
            </p>
            <p>


<span class="gradient_text"><h1>What We Do</h1></span>
<p>

1.   <b>Geospatial Analysis:</b> mapping and spatial analysis techniques to identify health disparities and high-risk areas, and inform targeted interventions.
<p>
2.   <b>Epidemiological Research:</b> rigorous epidemiological studies to uncover the root causes of health inequities and develop evidence-based strategies for prevention and intervention.
<p>
3.   <b>Capacity Building:</b> training and technical assistance to <del>empower</del> no, <span style="color:#00A9A3;">give power back </span>to local organizations and healthcare providers with the tools and knowledge to address health disparities in their communities.
<p>
4.   <b>Advocacy and Policy:</b> advocate for policies and initiatives that promote health equity and ensure that vulnerable populations have access to the resources and support they need to thrive.
<p>
